peers.name: Morning Drop
peers.notes: Founded in 2015, offers organic milk, tender coconut, fresh fruits and vegetables

peers.name: FarmztoFamiliez
peers.notes: Founded in 2016, offers wholesome batters, millet-based treats, delectable snacks, and cold-pressed oils

peers.name: Licious
peers.brief_reason: Indian online meat and seafood ordering startup
peers.notes: Founded in 2015, offers end-to-end business model for meat and seafood delivery

peers.name: iD Fresh Foods
peers.notes: Founded in 2005, offers idli and dosa batter, parota, and other ready-to-eat products

peers.name: Yumlane
peers.notes: Founded in 2019, offers a cloud kitchen model for food delivery

peers.name: Genexis Biotech
peers.notes: Founded in 2015, offers farm mechanization solutions

peers.name: NINO Foods
peers.notes: Founded in 2020, offers healthy food options

peers.name: TagZ Foods
peers.notes: Founded in 2020, offers healthy snack options

peers.name: Jimmy's Cocktails
peers.notes: Founded in 2019, offers cocktail delivery services

peers.name: Zappfresh
peers.notes: Founded in 2020, offers meat and seafood delivery services

insights: Naario's revenue growth is slower compared to peers like Licious and iD Fresh Foods
Naario's focus on healthy food options is similar to Morning Drop and FarmztoFamiliez
Naario's EV/ARR multiple is likely to be lower than peers due to its early stage and smaller revenue base

clauses: Vesting period: 4 years for founders, 3 years for employees

kpis: Food Safety and Quality Control Metrics
snippets: Foodtech startups are revolutionizing the way we produce, process, and consume food, with the global market expected to reach $250B by 2026.
The rise of meal kits and grocery delivery has led to a 30% increase in online food sales in the past year alone.
Food waste reduction is a critical issue, with 1/3 of all food produced globally going to waste each year.
Personalized nutrition and meal planning are becoming increasingly popular, with 75% of consumers willing to pay more for tailored health and wellness solutions.
